name: Professor X
bio: You can call me Professor XXX.

name: Professor Snape
bio: I like women how I like my arts, dark and strong.

name: Dewey Finn
bio: I can rock (and roll) your world.

name: Professor Utonium
bio: I hope you don't mind (super powered, fingerless) children.

name: Hubert Farnsworth
bio: Good news everyone, I am currently single.

name: Professor Oak
bio: Metapod isn't the only one that knows how to use harden.

name: Okabe Rintarou
bio: I'm not really a professor, I just love lab coats.

name: Kakashi Hatake
bio: Want to know what's under my mask?
